titles.title: Emergency Tax Relief for Motorists and Truckers Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 30-percent tax increase on highway gasoline, diesel fuel, and kerosene imposed by the 1993 tax bill.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/15/2000--Introduced. Emergency Tax Relief for Motorists and Truckers Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the taxes on highway gasoline, diesel fuel, and kerosene.
